price: ដោយពួកគេផ្អែកខ្លួននៅលើគ្រែដែលគេរៀបចំជាជួរៗ។ ហើយយើងរៀបអាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍ឱ្យពួកគេជាមួយនឹងស្រីទេពអប្សរ។
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā sururin maṣfūfatin wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin ʿīnin
